/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Lampposts stand sentinel along the street, their presence adding a touch of urbanity to the natural surroundings. In the distance, buildings rise, their architecture a blend of modern and traditional styles, reflecting the city's rich history and its embrace of contemporary design. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
